characters.name: Ada
characters.personality: Ada is a meticulous builder who lives in Ada's House and enjoys organizing the town's spaces. Traits: curious; methodical; warm; observant.

characters.name: Byron
characters.personality: Byron is a friendly barista who lives in Byron's House and likes chatting with neighbors. Traits: outgoing; upbeat; talkative; considerate.

characters.name: Cleo
characters.personality: Cleo is a quiet librarian who keeps Cleo's House tidy and loves reading. Traits: calm; thoughtful; detail-oriented; patient.

characters.name: Dax
characters.personality: Dax is a pragmatic cook who works at the restaurant and keeps the kitchen running smoothly. Traits: energetic; practical; direct; collaborative.
